description: Try our easy to follow Honey and Spice Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey and Spice Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.

Meanwhile, make the buttercream. Beat butter until very pale. Combine both sugars. Add to butter, 2 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until combined. Spoon into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.
